languages.text: Время потянулось бесконечной вереницей, и когда команда уже начала сходить с ума, Лорд-капитан решил выйти из варпа, наплевав на то, настал ли для этого нужный момент. Сообщения Навигатора и расход припасов, однако, показал, что вы пробыли там куда дольше положенного, застряв в аномалии у точки выхода, и прибыли не туда, куда собирались.

traits.locale_text: Время потянулось бесконечной вереницей, и когда команда уже начала сходить с ума, Лорд-капитан решил выйти из варпа, наплевав на то, настал ли для этого нужный момент. Сообщения Навигатора и расход припасов, однако, показал, что вы пробыли там куда дольше положенного, застряв в аномалии у точки выхода, и прибыли не туда, куда собирались.

languages.text: Time stretched into endless drudgery. When the crew began their descent into madness, the Lord Captain decided to exit the warp regardless of the consequences. However, the Navigator's reports and the consumption of supplies revealed that the vessel had spent far more time in the Immaterium than was expected. It seems the vessel had gotten stranded in an anomaly at the point of egress and arrived at an unintended location.
languages.original_text: Время потянулось бесконечной вереницей, и когда команда уже начала сходить с ума, Лорд-капитан решил выйти из варпа, наплевав на то, настал ли для этого нужный момент. Сообщения Навигатора и расход припасов, однако, показал, что вы пробыли там куда дольше положенного, застряв в аномалии у точки выхода, и прибыли не туда, куда собирались.

traits.locale_text: Time stretched in endless drudgery, and when the crew started going insane Lord Captain decided to exit the warp regardless of whether the time for it was right. However, the navigator's reports and the revision of supplies revealed the vessel spent far more time in the Immaterium than had been expected, got stranded in an anomaly next to the point of egress and arrived not where it had been meant to.

However, the navigator's reports and the revision of supplies revealed the vessel spent far more time in the Immaterium than had been expected, got stranded in an anomaly next to the point of egress and arrived not where it had been meant to.

Time stretched into endless drudgery. When the crew began their descent into madness, the Lord Captain decided to exit the warp regardless of the consequences. However, the Navigator's reports and the consumption of supplies revealed that the vessel had spent far more time in the Immaterium than was expected. It seems the vessel had gotten stranded in an anomaly at the point of egress and arrived at an unintended location.

languages.text: 当船员们接连陷入疯狂时，领主舰长决定不顾一切后果，跳出亚空间。然而，导航者的报告与耗用的物资显示，这艘飞船在亚空间中停留的时间已经远远超出了预期。看来这艘船在脱离亚空间的过程中搁了浅，抵达了某个意料之外的地方。
languages.original_text: Time stretched into endless drudgery. When the crew began their descent into madness, the Lord Captain decided to exit the warp regardless of the consequences. However, the Navigator's reports and the consumption of supplies revealed that the vessel had spent far more time in the Immaterium than was expected. It seems the vessel had gotten stranded in an anomaly at the point of egress and arrived at an unintended location.

traits.locale_text: 当船员们接连陷入疯狂时，领主舰长决定不顾一切后果，跳出亚空间。然而，导航者的报告与耗用的物资显示，这艘飞船在亚空间中停留的时间已经远远超出了预期。看来这艘船在脱离亚空间的过程中搁了浅，抵达了某个意料之外的地方。

languages.text: El tiempo se alargaba en una monotonía interminable. Cuando la tripulación inició su descenso a la locura, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán decidió salir de la disformidad sin importarle las consecuencias. Sin embargo, los informes de la Navegante y el consumo de suministros revelaron que la nave había pasado mucho más tiempo en el Inmaterio de lo esperado. Al parecer, la nave había quedado atrapada en una anomalía en el punto de salida y había llegado a un lugar inesperado.
languages.original_text: Time stretched into endless drudgery. When the crew began their descent into madness, the Lord Captain decided to exit the warp regardless of the consequences. However, the Navigator's reports and the consumption of supplies revealed that the vessel had spent far more time in the Immaterium than was expected. It seems the vessel had gotten stranded in an anomaly at the point of egress and arrived at an unintended location.

traits.locale_text: El tiempo se alargaba en una monotonía interminable. Cuando la tripulación inició su descenso a la locura, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán decidió salir de la disformidad sin importarle las consecuencias. Sin embargo, los informes de la Navegante y el consumo de suministros revelaron que la nave había pasado mucho más tiempo en el Inmaterio de lo esperado. Al parecer, la nave había quedado atrapada en una anomalía en el punto de salida y había llegado a un lugar inesperado.

languages.text: 時間は終わらない単調な仕事のように長かった。クルーが狂気へ堕ち始めたとき、ロード・キャプテンはどうなってもいいから<歪み>から出ることに決める。しかし、航宙士の報告と物資の消費量で、船が予想よりもはるかに多くの時間を非物質世界で過ごしていたことが判明する。船は脱出時に変異点で座礁して、想定外の場所に到着したようだ。
languages.original_text: Time stretched into endless drudgery. When the crew began their descent into madness, the Lord Captain decided to exit the warp regardless of the consequences. However, the Navigator's reports and the consumption of supplies revealed that the vessel had spent far more time in the Immaterium than was expected. It seems the vessel had gotten stranded in an anomaly at the point of egress and arrived at an unintended location.

traits.locale_text: 時間は終わらない単調な仕事のように長かった。クルーが狂気へ堕ち始めたとき、ロード・キャプテンはどうなってもいいから<歪み>から出ることに決める。しかし、航宙士の報告と物資の消費量で、船が予想よりもはるかに多くの時間を非物質世界で過ごしていたことが判明する。船は脱出時に変異点で座礁して、想定外の場所に到着したようだ。

languages.text: Le fil du temps s'étire en une interminable routine. Alors que l'équipage commence à sombrer dans la folie, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} prend la décision de quitter le Warp, quelles qu'en soient les conséquences. En analysant les rapports de la navigatrice et le niveau des provisions, il s'avère que le vaisseau a passé nettement plus de temps que prévu dans l'Immaterium. De toute évidence, le vaisseau a échoué dans une anomalie au point de sortie et a atteint une destination inattendue.
languages.original_text: Time stretched into endless drudgery. When the crew began their descent into madness, the Lord Captain decided to exit the warp regardless of the consequences. However, the Navigator's reports and the consumption of supplies revealed that the vessel had spent far more time in the Immaterium than was expected. It seems the vessel had gotten stranded in an anomaly at the point of egress and arrived at an unintended location.

traits.locale_text: Le fil du temps s'étire en une interminable routine. Alors que l'équipage commence à sombrer dans la folie, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} prend la décision de quitter le Warp, quelles qu'en soient les conséquences. En analysant les rapports de la navigatrice et le niveau des provisions, il s'avère que le vaisseau a passé nettement plus de temps que prévu dans l'Immaterium. De toute évidence, le vaisseau a échoué dans une anomalie au point de sortie et a atteint une destination inattendue.

languages.text: Die Zeit verkam zu endloser Plackerei. Als die Crew begann, in den Wahnsinn abzugleiten, entschied der Lord Captain, den Warp zu verlassen, ganz gleich, welche Konsequenzen das auch haben mochte. Doch die Berichte des Navigators und der Verbrauch an Vorräten offenbarten, dass das Schiff sehr viel länger als erwartet im Immaterium gewesen war. Offenbar war das Schiff am Ausgangspunkt in einer Anomalie gestrandet und daher an einem unbeabsichtigten Zielort angekommen.
languages.original_text: Time stretched into endless drudgery. When the crew began their descent into madness, the Lord Captain decided to exit the warp regardless of the consequences. However, the Navigator's reports and the consumption of supplies revealed that the vessel had spent far more time in the Immaterium than was expected. It seems the vessel had gotten stranded in an anomaly at the point of egress and arrived at an unintended location.

languages.text: Zaman, sonsuz bir angaryaya dönüştü. Mürettebatın deliliğe sürüklenmeye başlaması üzerine Lord Kaptan, sonuçları ne olursa olsun öteboyuttan çıkmaya karar verdi. Ancak Rotacı'nın raporları ve erzak tüketimi, geminin Tindiyar'da beklenenden çok daha uzun zaman geçirdiğini söylüyordu. Anlaşıldığı kadarıyla gemi, çıkış noktasında bir anomaliye sıkışmış ve hiç de amaçlanmayan bir konuma ulaşmıştı.
languages.original_text: Time stretched into endless drudgery. When the crew began their descent into madness, the Lord Captain decided to exit the warp regardless of the consequences. However, the Navigator's reports and the consumption of supplies revealed that the vessel had spent far more time in the Immaterium than was expected. It seems the vessel had gotten stranded in an anomaly at the point of egress and arrived at an unintended location.
